text: trong ban dakchenh nouv chbab sasanea ai sla m samreab puok anak( mnoussa lok) dauch avei del trong ban dak bangkeab vea towleu nuoh ning avei del yeung ban banhchouh aoy anak( mou ham meat) haeyning avei del yeung ban bangkeab towleu ai pr hi m mousaea ning ai sa nung vea der daoy aoy puok anak pongrung sasanea ning komaoy puok anak bekbak knea knong kechchakar sasanea aoy saoh . vea thngonthngor bamphot samreab puok mou sh ri ki n nouv avei del anak ampeavneav puokke towkean vea( sasanea) noh . a l laoh chreusa reusa anaknea del trong mean chetnea aoy towkean sasanea robsa trong haey trong changaoulobangheanh dl anaknea del vilotralb towkean trong ( daoy som aphytosa ning korp tam batobanhchea robsa trong)
